page.title: 07AMENITIES IN LAMLASH.
page.content: They include the island's only secondary school and one of the seven primary schools.There are shops,police station,fire station and council buildings.The shops are near the village centre the biggest one being the CO.OP Supermarket.There are three craft shops having their busiest period over the summer.There are many hotels,boarding houses,camp sites and caravan parks dealing with the needs of the tourists. The only hospital on the island is also situated in Lamlash.It can deal with most everyday medical problems and minor operations. There are also sport facilities in Lamlash which include,tennis courts, putting green,golf course,bowling and a sailing club.Also there is a small harbour from which a ferry runs to the Holy Isle.
